definition: a spot that is open late at night and that provides entertainment (as singers or dancers) as well as dancing and food and drink, to gather into a club-like mass
details:
noun
- a spot that is open late at night and that provides entertainment (as singers or dancers) as well as dancing and food and drink
= synonyms: cabaret
- stout stick that is larger at one end
= example: stout stick that is larger at one end
- a playing card in the minor suit that has one or more black trefoils on it
= example: a playing card in the minor suit that has one or more black trefoils on it
- a building that is occupied by a social club
= example: a building that is occupied by a social club
= synonyms: clubhouse
- golf equipment used by a golfer to hit a golf ball
= synonyms: golf club, golf-club
- a team of professional baseball players who play and travel together
= example: a team of professional baseball players who play and travel together
= synonyms: nine
- a formal association of people with similar interests
= example: a formal association of people with similar interests
= synonyms: order
verb
- to gather into a club-like mass
= example: to gather into a club-like mass
- to strike with a club or a bludgeon
= example: to strike with a club or a bludgeon
= synonyms: bludgeon
- to gather and spend time together
= example: to gather and spend time together
- to unite with a common purpose
= example: to unite with a common purpose
